overview: On June 11th NWA presents its next PPV event - it's Alwayz Ready live from Knoxville Tennesee!  The event features pro wrestling stars such as the NWA Worlds Heavyweight Champion Matt Cardona, Nick Aldis, Trevor Murdoch, the NWA World Women's Champion Kamille, Chris Adonis, the NWA World Television Champion Tyrus and many more.
title: NWA Alwayz Ready
